website_summaries.verdict: One of the most effective ultrasonic devices to repel rodents and other larger pests.
pros: Uses 5 methods to help get rid of rodents and/or keep them away, with high-intensity signals to annoy and confuse pests
Easy to use – just plug in an area where pests are an issue
cons: Doesn't work in all situations, especially if you have a large infestation

customer_reviews.title: Cleanrth CR008
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK AT ALL. We have one of the ultrasonic rodent repelling system in our kitchen. One day a mouse decided to come out of his hiding place, get up on the toaster which is directly across from the ultrasonic rodent repelling system about 7 feet away. This mouse got crumbs from the drawer of the toaster and came up, sat on the top of the toaster staring at my husband and myself and ate his breakfast of crumbs like he was part of the family. submitted a review to the company. Had no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for every household.
customer_reviews.text: NO MORE MICE OR RATS!!!! I've even noticed no bugs!!! This product is amazing... one is not enough though. 3 are ideal, kitchen, bathroom & main bedroom. Even the termites are outta here. We live across of a field it's tropical so bugs roaches and rodents constantly find their way in no matter what! I cannot be happier with this product. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE & UNDERSTANDING!!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, mice we're gone in 5 days.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, well worth the money. I had the worst infestation, the mice had nests and babies. The pest control wasn't working. We killed 25 mice in over 3 month, with no end in sight. In 5 days with this device, all the mice we're gone.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of this products as I can hear mouse running inside my basement wall. I have already tried 2 repelling devices from Lowe's but no effect at all. As this model has better wall penetration so I just bought 2. I followed their instruction and put 1 to mode 1, another 1 to mode 2, put them to each side of the wall electric outlet. I checked the result after 5 days, and I didn't hear anything from wall, and no mouse droppings. I had a question and sent email to the seller, I got response in few hours with good instruction, very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: This Really Works!! Give it a little time..
customer_reviews.text: I live in an 2000 sq. ft. single family house that had an attic that was totally infested with rats and mice. They would start in at about 1: AM and party until dawn. Lots of running and scampering and noise. I bought the Cleanrth CR008 but was skeptical. I periodically changed the settings per the directions. It took about 4 weeks but little by little, the system kicked in. Now there is no indication of any activity at all. I totally recommend this device-it works-just give it a little time. Ken in So. Cal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: in a good location that afforded the "sound waves" to permeate the ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had occasional mouse issues for over 2 decades. Recently saw a spike with a couple mouse sightings and droppings in the kitchen. Put some poison out of reach of our dogs and it was eaten. One day later placed this device in our kitchen...in a good location that afforded the "sound waves" to permeate the area. Kept the poison but no takers. Deliberately left some food out on the kitchen counter to see what would happen... No apparent mice activity. I ordered a second device to put in my garage. Will see what happens. Pleased with the results. Device makes sense. Recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Martino

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to work on the very first night we used it! No scratching in the walls...not a sound. Unfortunately, we happen to have a cat that seems affected. Our other cats and dog were just fine, but this particular cat was upset when we plugged in the unit and continued to be bothered when we relocated it twice. This company provides exceptional customer service. The rep I got on the phone was very patient with me, answered all my questions and explained that it is VERY RARE, but there have been times they’ve had reports of pets being affected. He immediately issued a refund while I was on the phone. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Professionalshopper

customer_reviews.title: No affect on Rocky the squirrel
customer_reviews.text: Set this thing at full strength right off the bat. Have had it wailing for almost a month now. Still have the squirrel in the attic. I think I even heard him singing along with the ultrasonic signal at times. Save your money. Call an exterminator.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: No longer - Appears to work in my basement.
customer_reviews.text: I placed this device in the basement to deter rodents from crawling in the basement ceiling and eating spilled bird seed. So far I have not seen any evidence of any unwanted creatures. Outside, the squirrels and birds seem to be uneffected by any sonic frequencies. 12-9-17 Update. Mickey Mouse lives, in my basement. The little critter scurried across my basement floor, hid under a pallet and looked back to see if I saw 'em. Not so sure this deterrent works all that well.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Gundersen

customer_reviews.title: It gave us headaches. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it works on getting rid of mice or not, but it made my husband and I want to leave the house! Every time we turned it on it gave us headaches, a throbbing above our ears on both sides of our heads. We have cats too, so thinking it affects them as well, they just can’t tell us. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had mice in my garage. Plugged this in and they were gone in less than 2 days. If you have a "critter" problem, get this. It goes make some clicking sounds which if it was inside would probably make me crazy but if you need it in your garage or basement or an area you don't commonly use in your house, this will take care of the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Angst

customer_reviews.title: I hate buying things that kill and I have a humane ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, there's a mouse in the house and it's not disturbed by the noise. I thought it was working for a while but then here we go again. I am a not a neat freak but there are no open food containers, things are put in baggies in the pantry but living in the woods has its accompanying problems. I hate buying things that kill and I have a humane mouse trap but this mouse is not buying into the real estate. I have peppermint oileverywhere, had aluminum foil lining the drawers, this ultrasonic and this critter is still here.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Safety?
customer_reviews.text: I can definitely tell my dog reacts to the ultrasonic rodent repeller when turned on, which has made me nervous to use it. Does anyone know if this is harmful to dogs or how to contact the manufacturer?! Any help would be greatly appreciated. Concerned pet owner. Thank you! [2 stars only because have not tested it out yet]
customer_reviews.author: Magda K.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad mouse problem in our basement this fall and winter. I tried a couple other "lower cost" electronic devices that did not make any difference. The CLEANRTH CR008 has been running in our basement for exactly one month now and I have yet to see evidence of a single mouse. I have several traps set-up as well and haven't caught any mice since installing. I am considering purchasing another unit for our shed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gromulus

customer_reviews.title: Marmots love it!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my cabin last winter because marmots were defecating on my porch. When I opened up my cabin for the summer, I found that not only did this device not keep rodents away, but they had built a bed and toilet right next to it. (See attached picture) Marmots seem to love this device. If you want Marmots to dig a hole through your wall, then buy this device. If you don’t like Marmots and don’t like having to repair holes in your house you might consider this device to be low value.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wifall

customer_reviews.title: Mice problem gone, with their support- GIVE IT TIME!
customer_reviews.text: Our vacation home has a crawl space that somehow mice have found their way into. I purchased the Advanced repeller CR008 and placed it in the crawl space along with a trail camera to monitor any possible activity. After the designated time I checked the camera and it was like the mice were posing for their pictures; it wasn't working. I contacted CLEANRTH explaining my problem and they sent me two different repellers with instructions at no charge. It's been almost a month since I've set the additional repellers up and have NOT HAD A SINGLE MICE ON THE TRAIL CAMERA. CONGRATS CLEANRTH ON A GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: J. Baney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is not an inexpensive item. I placed it in a garage where mice have entered and chewed wiring on some vehicles. To see if it was working, I placed several mouse glue traps very near the device. Sure enough, within a week or two, there was a mouse on the glue trap, so the sounds clearly did not dissuade him/her from entering. I gave it 2 stars only because there was not a mouse on the second trap. I don't think it is worth it at all. Good advertising, but not so effective!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy 48

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product to get rid of a rat that at night I could hear chewing on my house. The rat continued chewing what sounded like maybe 4 feet from the device. It's a fake waste of money scam do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this but alas, it DOESN'T! I had a little critter in my house and telltale signs were left behind. I used this inside my home, near the area where the signs were. I thought it worked but the little "poop seeds" were still appearing. I purchased an electronic mouse trap and low and behold...the critter was caught and disposed of several days after I used the trap. Save your money and sanity! Don't use this garbage product!
customer_reviews.author: TDIguy

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, Great product.  It does work very well.  Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, Great product. Mice decided to give me a moving out notice. It's in the attic , they vacated a second floor, and decided to hand out in the garage. That's when the traps did their job. I found the hole where they were sneaking inside, closed it, problem solved. Now it's still on the attic and the pigeons, or crows don't want to hand around my roof, which is great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Ratajczak

customer_reviews.title: Actually works, I can't believe it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling to get rid my of mice infested house for years. They come in through the basement and then get into the walls and the attic. I could hear them throughout the night. My house is a small (1300 square foot) 1910 Colonial. I simply plugged this unit into a socket in the basement. I haven't heard anything since. It has been a month so far. I don't understand how it could work so well but I am so happy for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything to catch what I believed to be a roof rat (poop looked roof rats), glue traps, latest bait traps, old wire bait traps, bucket trap, rodent glue tubes, baited with every type of food (cheese, meat, fruit, cereal, peanut butter etc. and got NOTHING! Turns out it was a bat not a rat or mouse, (poop looks same, shape and size) also turns out the CLEANRTH CR008 can be adjusted/set for bats, can't beat that. As a retired quality assurance specialist and customer service rep (42 years Fed. gov.) I never encountered better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Quality Assurance Specialist

customer_reviews.title: Not effective on rats.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work. The rats just walk passed by. I had it in my garage for over one month. Make no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Gan

customer_reviews.title: My garage is pest free
customer_reviews.text: I have had this installed since February 2019 in my tandem garage. It works as described. There is a slight ticking that it puts out but very tolerable and cannot be heard inside the house. I incorporated it with an IGNIUS Ultrasonic Pest Repeller. The Clean earth repeller is located in the back of the tandem while the Ignius is in the standard side of the garage. Both are unobstructed. I live in Nevada in an area crawling with critters. I leave my garage door and side door open quite often. I have not had one issue with bugs, spiders, rodents, etc. since I installed these devices.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R Slack

customer_reviews.title: not very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Tried all the different sounds a features. Still had rats and squirrels. Actually caught 2 rats in a trap just below it about 2 feet away. Finally got ride of the rats and squirrels by sprinkling ground up Irish Spring in attic. Got rid of the rodents and made it smell good. Had to sprinkle about 3 different times about 2 weeks apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G

customer_reviews.title: They stand behind their products, and will help you find a solution
customer_reviews.text: Cleanrth has awesome customer service! While this particular model did not work for me because I could hear the sound, they sent me another model, the Elite, which is silent. Over the course of a month has gotten rid of the mice in my kitchen after many months of struggle. They say you need to wait 21 days to see results, so be patient. I really appreciate the knowledgeable, responsive support from Cleanrth, and their commitment to finding a solution to your problem.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Well, well - just might work. 8 months in and no rat evicence to be seen...
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical of these high frequency audio beepers, I must admit that after plugging this one on a patio outlet: Not a rat to be seen nor rat droppings under the planters. Chance? Maybe. Maybe this thing actually works! Now: At what electric expense (likely insignificant) but for how long? Dog is undisturbed (good). Hummingbirds still flying about aplenty (good). Being outside in the sun and occasional rain, how long will it last? When failing, how do I know? Rather not have the rats tell me. Rather would like a failure light on the unit that I might be alerted to get another which I would do in a trice.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good Bye Mice
customer_reviews.text: ...seems to work as advertised....on only one week so far and no mice in attic (~ 3000sq ft)...I also turned on 2 led lights to run 24/7 (..mice hate light)...the combination may help, but last year at this time I had 15 mice caught by now...with this unit, none so far !
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: a little costly but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Two years ago i bought two of these - put one in my leather shop to deter mice, and jerry rigged a "portable" receptacle board for under the crawlspace of our house for the other. Rats - RATS!!! are the issue under the house, and this one unit did seem to keep them out of that end of the crawl space. House is nearly 70 feet long, however, and rats still burrowed underneath at the other end. I'm getting one more to see if I can finally get complete deterrence.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best customer support on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered an EL300 and a CR008 in October 2018 to battle rat intrusions thru our lanai screens, nests in our roof gutter system drains, and an occasional visitors to our attic. We had a pest control "expect" come by who said that for a couple hundred bucks, they would try to fix the problems. We decided to give it a try on our own using Cleanrth's products. It took a while but with outstanding help and support from the Cleanrth folks, we are now rat (and mice) free!! If you have similar problems, I highly recommend giving Clearth a try.
customer_reviews.author: id_biker

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I have only this product three weeks, I had not seen any in the basement but this is where I placed it. It seen to me mice started from basement and go up behind the stove. So far I'm pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tweety

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money. We have a very shallow attic with no real space to crawl around and we had roof rats invade. This unit helped but we still were having some issues. I contacted customer support and the problem is fixed. Don't waste your money on cheaper units - they don't work. CLEANRTH CR008 does and is great. GWB
customer_reviews.author: GWB

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for Squirrels and Rodents burrowing in my back yard
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this into an outlet on my back patio. My fenced in back yard is about 18'X13', and I had burrowing rodents digging nuts up or burrowing unto my flower beds. I plugged it in 6 days ago and my issues are solved. After only 3 days I went from at least one new hole in my garden to no holes and no pesky rodents digging around. The device is easy to use and a great value. The package also came with lots of information about getting in contact with the seller if this device does not solve your small mammal issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bobert

customer_reviews.title: These are worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 a year ago in Feb. I waited to see if I would have any rodents in the winter. These are the best devices and I can't tell you how excited I've been this winter with no problems. It also got rid of my spider crickets too. They were huge. If you have problems with mice buy from this company. They have 2 levels that they tell you to change so the mice don't get used to the sound. And I do that all the time!! It has worked for my old house. I hope this company keeps making this product. Because if or when mine stop working I will buy more. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D

customer_reviews.title: Using against moles, so far so good
customer_reviews.text: We've got a squirrel and mole issue in the backyard. We have paid for consultants to come out and help us deal with the moles, but so far they keep coming back. We're currently using this to deter moles from our yard, specifically in the back area where we frequently see them. It's been about a week, and we are still not seeing the typical tunnels that wind in our yard. Could this be it?! We've noticed the squirrel population has gone down a bit too- so hopefully this will fix both problems. For the price, yes I'd give it a try. So much better than dealing with dead/mutilated/trapped rodents!
customer_reviews.author: targaholic

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Item is worthless. Watched the rat come within 1 foot of the device and rat completely ignored it and wasn't effected in the slightest. I went to home depot and paid $20 for a 3-pack by Victor and it was much more effective than this $60 piece of plastic. Description states "7000 sq ft?" It must be an totally empty testing room with no internal walls. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Plugged this in about two months ago in my basement because I knew I had a field mouse in there (it happens, corn and hay fields very near to my house) Waited a few weeks and wasn't sure if it was or wasn't working but found two mice in the basement after work one night so I decided to switch up the settings to see if that worked. They very next day they were gone and no signs of them being back since. So happy I made this purchase and followed the instructions that came with them. Plus great customer service. Would recommend this product to anyone with similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fern Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Big mouse problem
customer_reviews.text: Had a real big mouse problem and tried everything to get rid of them as quickly as I could. I saw this product and thought what can I lose so went ahead and purchased one. It was not working for me so I contacted the retailer and they helped me and stuck with me until this problem got under control. They were great and would recommend them to anyone with mouse problem.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Need Stage 2 help NOW
customer_reviews.text: Need stage 2 help as the two units I purchased do not seem to be effective in repelling. Have been using over a month now.
customer_reviews.author: BIGGUYWAW

customer_reviews.title: No more mice in the RV
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked for us. We've had a motorhome for almost 4 years and never had a mice issue until several months ago. I found this on Amazon, read the reviews, and called the company to ask questions not on the website. Since our unit would be parked for a while, they recommend two units at different areas, set with different sonar patterns. All the mice poop was picked up, then the units were set up and confirmed they worked (you gotta listen closely). And 3 months later - no poop anywhere. We've just bought one more for our pickup that will be parked over the winter in our shop.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of that critter in your bedroom wall!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large mystery critter that likes to dance inside my bedroom wall at night. I used an ultrasonic repellant and it helped for a while. However it eventually returned. When it returned, I purchased this particular repellant. I like that it uses different frequencies so the offending critter doesn't get used to it. I have used it for weeks and so far, I have had no more issues.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Buy more than one
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and it was not cutting it. Called and had AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! They sent me two more and within the week all mice were gone. Could not be happier with the product.
customer_reviews.author: ed blanchard

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: It really works! I have been fighting mice for months. I have not seen 1 mouse since I plugged the first unit in the wall. I reordered and have a total of 8 units. One for almost every room. Again, IT REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Renee - MD

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was worried. After I ordered this I saw other ultrasonic rodent repellent products demonstrated on youtube that did not work. But I already had made the order. When it arrived I plugged it in. We had a horrible mouse infestation this past winter. But after only a few days all signs of mice were gone and I have not seen any since. Not all Ultrasonic rodent repellings systems work, but this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast results
customer_reviews.text: We have a problem with chipmunks. Although they're cute and fun to watch outside, they can be destructive little critters. Recently, we started hearing them in the living room walls, chewing and scurrying about. I bought the CLEANRTH CR008, read the instructions and plugged it in a living room outlet closest to the noise. The effect was almost immediate. In the first week, we heard only brief rustles, as if they were entering and leaving quickly. It's been quiet for for another week now. It works! I'm ordering another unit today for my wife's basement sewing room. Bob, Racine, Wisconsin
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Used to keep the mice out this winter!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item to use as a preventative measure. With the weather cooling off, we typically see an increased amount of rodent activity in our basement. We’ve had this plugged in for a little over a week now, traps still set, and have found nothing in our traps! Customer service is superior for this product as well! The instructions are a little intimidating, but as I said, you can contact customer service with any questions or specifications! I’ll definitely keep this thing going all winter! So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: briannacorri

customer_reviews.title: So Far so good
customer_reviews.text: We live on the lake and especially in this season, we start to see a lot of mice and rats. My neighbor whom townhouse is attached to mine seems to always have something going on in his attic then they start to come to mine. I am a single mom of 2 and I can't keep calling out the exterminator as it is a lot of money each time so I decided to try this and so far since I started using this I have not seen anything, no dropping or noise in the attic. I will continue to use this as it is a cheaper alternative to the pest control guys,
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Villardi

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised of the results!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the Ultrasonic Rodent Repelling System, I wasn't sure if it was going to work, but to my surprise it did! I have cats and unfortunately they aren't mousers, and I found that I had mice in my basement. I couldn't use poison or traps because I have cats, so I thought that I would give this a try. It doesn't work instantly, but I have been using these for almost 2 months and there is no trace of mice! I will definitely keep these plugged in to keep those buggers out!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Im convinced and very happy with the effectiveness if this gizmo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for use against squirrels and chipmunks that were dissembling my grain room. I really didnt want to have to bring in some barn cats. Within one week there were no signs of rodents. Granted, the space is small, about 12 X 12, and this is the season when rodents retreat to the outdoors anyway, so I turned the machine off and within two days there was clear evidence that the wee beasties had returned. Im convinced and very happy with the effectiveness if this gizmo. Ill most certainly order a few more for my barns.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I'm rodent free finally!! No bull!
customer_reviews.text: I am rodent free!! Finally!! No more little fury friends cohabitation w us anymore!! They finally got the eviction notice! This is one happy homeowner -landlord!! Lol!! No more poop and dead surprises! All clear and I'm skipping in my basement to do the laundry and sort for organization without fear!
customer_reviews.author: Jess B.

customer_reviews.title: This really works for real
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product actually works to get rid of mice. I have one in my home, detached garage and cabin. I recently bought a 4th unit for a large shed in the backyard. I went to move my patio cushions and the mice had made a four story condo. I had used one in the shed previously but moved it to the garage farther away...mistake. I had never had mice in the shed in the past and now I know why. I will keep them out this time with my repeller. One of these keeps mice out of my entire house. Prior to using the repeller mice and chipmunks would waltz through the door. Crazy! Get one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy-peasy!
customer_reviews.text: This repeller make things SOOOO much easier than using traps, etc. I’ve used/done all kinds of rodent control from the small plastic tipping-tube style mouse traps, to spray foam, steel wool, spring traps and the awful (please forgive me) glue traps, for rats. My next step was going to possibly be the electronic “zapping” box trap that I kept seeing at the hardware store, but I couldn’t bring myself to get/do it. The repeller is so much easier, and much, much, much more humane. I like this one’s variety of “target” and “confusion/chaos” modes, and the nightlight is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine

customer_reviews.title: It works and has night light!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had a few mice in my apartment throughout the year. Was very excited to try this product, came in perfect condition! Have only had it plugged in for 3 nights but absolutely no mice or little mice feet /squeaks!! Also it has a nightlight that can be switched on or off, which is an nice added feature. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: NycHope

customer_reviews.title: Better to call pest control.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. The gang of mice partied for the entire time this product is on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Had some little field mice that got into the house due to some constructions happening and the weather turning. Little buggers seemed to get humane trap smart pretty quickly so we were searching for something else to try out that wouldn't hurt them. This little gadget seems to work pretty well. It is recommended that you switch up the frequencies after 8 days, I did this a little sooner and I think it works best when you switch between the settings every 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Handy Item to help with pests
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about this product because the concept was newer to me. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the device that I received. It did not feel cheap or flimsy. It was easy to install and get working. It has provided a better solution for pest control then what we previously had. I will also add that the information that came in the box with the product was extremely helpful and informational. The sellers seem to have thought about common questions and addressed the installation process by providing helpful information.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for getting rid of raccoon
customer_reviews.text: Really wish we had ordered this right off the bat instead of spending hundreds with a pest control company when we had a racoon in our attic. Maybe a day after plugging this in to the outlet in our attic, the raccoon and its babies left for good. We had been trying for weeks to get rid of it using a pest control company who put traps, sprays, sealed up entry points, etc and nothing was working. Highly recommend everyone try this for rodents in the attic!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Pate

customer_reviews.title: This removed a squirrel from an insulated roof space.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for over a month. It removed a persistent squirrel from a roof space that was otherwise inaccessible. It's a small area above a ceiling and below a roof filled with fiberglass insulation. I loaded this speaker into an area where it could broadcast into the space from our attic. The squirrel seems to have left, something that a previous ultrasonic device and several traps failed to accomplish. So far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jknezek

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it's working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these, they have been on night and day for about 3 weeks now, i'm still seeing droppings in the garage and am hearing sounds in between my walls. Was expecting more, any recommendations from the seller?
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! We have had a few squirrel and rat issues in our attic and walls for some time now, and nothing seemed to be helping. As soon as we switched this on, we noticed that the clawing and sneaking rat sounds disappeared! I would definitely recommend this product, and maybe suggest that you buy 2 or 3 if you have a bigger house.
customer_reviews.author: Naiha Khan

customer_reviews.title: American company delivers!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this device. I was worried it'd drive my cats nuts, but they didn't even notice this and it seems to be keeping all the unwanted housemates away. I love that it came with loads of information about the product, how to use it, and possible next steps if needed. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessnarch

customer_reviews.title: So far no complaints with this one, I also ...
customer_reviews.text: So far no complaints with this one, I also have the T3-R electronic repellent in the 800 sq ft 2nd fl apartment, and I'm hoping n praying both together works however, we recently put steel wool around the heating vents to help keep them out so with all three I believe we got them out.
customer_reviews.author: driese

customer_reviews.title: Safe Pest Control in Multiple Stages,
customer_reviews.text: This is a safe alternative to harmful posion or other destructive methods of pest control. It was nice because of the guarantee from the manufacturer, where if you don't see difference they will offer customer support, to make sure the setup is correct. You don't have to replace batteries or keep buying bait. You can easily test the different frequencies by pressing each mode, which gives an audible chirp. LED's flash red to also show its working. Aesthetically this looks like a modern device, almost futuristic looking. The green nightlight feature is a nice addition to find where the outlets are. The instructions are easy to read and follow. Clearnth made a user-friendly product that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: KomradKyle

customer_reviews.title: This device emits very effect signals and sounds that mice hate.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as one of 3 weapons to keep mice out of my home. It is the most effect electronic mouse repelling device that I have ever used, and I’ve used several. I plan on calling the company for further advice, as they suggest, so that I can keep those disease ridden creatures from ever coming back.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Love the sincerity and adore this product
customer_reviews.text: So far I absolutely recommend this method. And I tried the expensive people who come to your house and easily find where the mice are coming in, and they still come in after you pay your $400. I have had mice for 30 years that have made it from the soil level all the way to my bedroom level, driving me crazy. Now they are gone. I like the guarantee and the willingness to help. Nothing is worse than having mice all winter!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like it promises
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this device eliminating my squirrel problem in my attic but it did work. Following the instructions, i set it up in the attic. Within 24 hours activity decreased. He did come back in a few hours but didnt stay long. Came again the next day for a short time, and then he has not been back. And that is several months now. I am impressed. It did what it said it would do at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Rat repellent that works!
customer_reviews.text: bought it two years ago, no rats. these ones work but folks are cheap so they would rather spend less..well good luck with the that and enjoy the rats..or buy this one
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Repels mice.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of weeks later I didn’t see signs of mice. I did buy another product for another room so in conjunction I think it eliminated the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Edwina J.

customer_reviews.title: Mice
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to get rid of winter mice and summer spiders and I do believe it really does work. It has been about 2 months since we started using it and I honestly can tell you I have not seen even 1 mouse. We only get them when it gets cold out and we live on the river so we will see how it does with the spiders in the spring. So far I am beyond happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Lieber

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a little while now for a rat issue. I'm definitely hearing the rats less often and when I do hear them, they run into things. I would say they're for sure getting disoriented! Lol. We've been able to trap 2 so far as they'll stay in the bathroom where they come in. Hopefully in a couple more weeks we won't have the issue at all!
customer_reviews.author: kara hargrave

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't believe it , it does work Rodent Repeller
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant about purchasing this product. I have a opossum who's taken up residence in my back storage room. I've had a professional company come out and set traps they couldn't catch it. I was all out of options.. I purchased this rodent repellent and plugged it in and to my surprise the opossum is gone. . I still can't believe it.. Trust me this really works.
customer_reviews.author: Falicia Newsome

customer_reviews.title: The key is persistence, patience, and getting advice from the expert at Cleanrth.
customer_reviews.text: I had a squirrel inside my home between the cathedral ceiling and roof. Impossible to discourage squirrel any other way. Couldn’t determine entry/exit points. This unit with advice from Cleanrth did the trick. The squirrel(s) are gone and have not reentered the house although they are seen outside. I emphasize the importance of speaking with Cleanrth for their knowledgeable advice.
customer_reviews.author: Gail G.

customer_reviews.title: It Works !6
customer_reviews.text: I received this Rodent Repeller 2weeks ago. It jworks great! I had found a family of mice living in my glove compartment. They have left and seem to have found somewhere else to live. My husband found a mouse living in his air filter. It is gone. This product delivers on what it promises. It is much more substantial than other devices like this. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne patrick

customer_reviews.title: Got stubborn squirrels to move away
customer_reviews.text: This along with a device for the ground worked at getting rid of a family of squirrels. We hung the device up near the gutters at the front door. We noticed after 2 days it wasn’t working as the squirrels ate through the extension cord. We lowered the cord out of reach and a week later the family has moved on. We are so glad it worked as other things we tried had not. We have removed it after 2 weeks of no activity. We will keep an eye on the situation. If they return it will go back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rats no more!
customer_reviews.text: This came with excellent instructions and it's been effective so far. Super easy and safe around the kids which is exactly what we were looking for. Well worth the investment and we feel safer not using traps/poison. The company that sells these is super helpful and really makes sure you know how to use the product. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: J&K Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful high frequency sound
customer_reviews.text: My device arrived today; I’m praying it works because I’m scared of mice and I think I’ve seen about 2; I did the sound test and I can literally still hear it ringing in my head; If mice are not annoyed by this sound I don’t know how not; will update in a week
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: So far as I can tell, it works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a problem with mice in my attached garage. On the advice of a friend, I bought the CLEANRTH rodent repeller a few weeks ago. So far as I have been able to tell, it's working! What I like best is that it doesn't require poison, traps, etc. It simply makes the mice decide to spend the winter elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Deecy

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a week of use before reviewing. I had problems with rabbits digging under my porch and we had a mouse that like to visit our grill at night.I plugged it into one of the porch outlets and waited to see any difference. After a week of use I haven't noticed signs of either coming around the porch. My dog usually runs a rabbit every time he goes in the back yard and this week hasn't had to their not around. I haven't noticed any mouse droppings around the grill either. I would like to see how it works more over time but so far it's worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Somer

customer_reviews.title: This does work!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and how it was packaged. I have a mouse problem in the winter or when the weather gets cold and swore I saw one last week ,so I when I plugged this in when I got it I haven't seen that little bigger ever since! It's quiet and doesn't bother the dogs. Comes with instructions and help guides. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: stevee hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Originally the device said to try it for a few months before it can show results. I even bought 2 for wider coverage. It has been more than a few month and no results. I do not suggest buying this, especially at the current price of $60.
customer_reviews.author: James X.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mice & squirrel repellent for the garage!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2nd same unit for my 1-car oversized garage used as storage and the problem of the mice and squirrels living and making a "crappy" mess in my garage is gone! They also don't use the place for nesting their young anymore either. There hasn't been a trace of their droppings in several months after years of their infestation. This particular model/unit really works! All the other cheap ones we tried didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Padre

customer_reviews.title: Airbnb Period trailer rentals...rats be gone
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of period trailer rentals sitting on five acres in Tucson, Arizona. Pack rat haven. My trailers are Avions, metal trailers. I installed the ultrasonic system with a rat stuck inside the trailer and it literally ate through the metal storage compartment door to get out of the trailer. The ultrasonic system seems to be working so far, (about three months). I must be part rat because the sound repels me, BUT I've had 11 guests staying inside these trailers that have tolerated the pitch without issue.
customer_reviews.author: desert hiker

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have worked
customer_reviews.text: I found some dropping in my garage and ordered this based on the reviews. I also ordered a trap just in case it didn't work. After two days of have this unit running I set the trap with some peanut butter and a week later the trap is set. I guess it worked.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: After years trying to rid our house of mice with a cat, various traps, electronic contraptions, carpentry and even an electrocution device (this worked too but they kept coming) both the mice and the squirrels have vacated our home. My engineer friend recommended as it has variable frequencies which did the trick. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Must say Cleanrth CR008 really does work. I followed the directions and plugged it in. The first two nights after plugging it in, I heard a lot of scratching and I wS getting frustrated. I remembered the directions said that there may be an increase in activity at first and I sure did have that. After the first few nights, I have not heard a sound. I even put out a couple of traps to make sure nothing was in my house and Otho g is in my house! So, so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beaudoin

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This works!!! My roofer told me there was really no way to keep rats out of my attic space under my tile roof. I tried everything short of poison, which I’m against. Nothing worked. Now... after 12 days with two of these units in the attic space, I rarely hear anything up there anymore, whereas I heard them day and night before. I think they have moved out and newcomers must scurry away too :) this gadget has solved a huge problem for me and I’m so grateful.
customer_reviews.author: G V

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have squirrels on my attic, I bought this product with high hopes to have them stop coming back, as they advertise their product, instead they build a nest next to it, treat the light on a device as it is their night light, truly a mistake buying it
customer_reviews.author: Malgorzata Zukowski

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING WORKS!! I was very skeptical, but I had a problem. Squirrels were getting into the wall behind my shower. I tried banging on the wall repeatedly. They would leave for a short while, but always returned. I was getting worried about the damage they might be causing, so, in desperation, I ordered this. The directions say to expect results in 3 to 4 weeks. I got results in 3 to 4 DAYS!!! No more squirrels in my wall. I was very hesitant to spend the money, but I did my research. My research lead me to believe that this thing might possibly work, so I ordered it. IT HAS FAR EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS!!! I can recommend it wholeheartedly!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and use of it. Only thing is the size of it. It’s kind of bigger than I thought it Would be. Its definitely easy to use without instructions but they do help! It definitely kept bugs away. If the size don’t bother you than it definitely a keeper!!!4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Shyne

customer_reviews.title: So awesome! At last I have defeated the vermin! (update)
customer_reviews.text: This product is greatness! Bought one. Worked so well, I bought another. I intend to buy more (one more for the far part of the attic, one for the crawlspace). --UPDATE-- I am buying #3 now !!! -- This device does NOT bother my dog at all. A friend had warned me that devices that used sound would drive the dog crazy, but no, not at all. Glad I tried it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Q.

customer_reviews.title: It takes time for them to start working, not an overnight success but success nonetheless!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, my mouse problem was so bad, ordered two, when they came in the post I immediately plugged them in and left town for two weeks!!! I came back to a horrible mess, the mice already in the house went phyco and literally tore up my house, had a friend watching my house who set out traps both snap traps and glue traps, dead mice in every one of them, but by God I have not seen a mouse since I got home! Not a sign of them, I can finally clean my kitchen without feeling like I was doing it for nothing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginnie B Helland

customer_reviews.title: Pesky rodents be gone
customer_reviews.text: I've had a mouse getting in my garage recently and it has been digging through the trash almost on a daily basis. Since I received my ultrasonic rodent repeller I haven't found a single sign of the mouse in my trash. The setup was simple, and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: coffeem8zzz

customer_reviews.title: leave where the vermin is coming and going open. place the device, wait 2 to 3 weeks, use expanding foam in openings, no signs?
customer_reviews.text: It works, being a skeptic I was hesitant but I didn't want one of these stinky bastards dying in my attic so I gave it a try, I figured if I kept the box I could always send it back however, it is clean, undetectable, worked in 2 to 3 weeks, cleared my problem
customer_reviews.author: Larry Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it was supposed to kill mice but in my case that's exactly what it did. In one week found three mice dead. Was a tad scary at first as they were coming out sqeeking in the daytime which I found unusual. The last week I have seen or heard no activity. Im keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this Rodent Repelling System! We kept hearing a critter up in our attic at the same time each night and ever since we got this Repelling System, we haven't heard a single noise up there! I also love how this uses sound waves to deter rodents instead of using chemicals or traps because I really do not like to kill animals and would much rather deter them than for them to be killed. Awesome product, I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nick & Katie Magill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to understand and setup. We always have a mouse problem in our basement around Spring/Summer time so we had set this up near a window downstairs. The weather has just started to get a little warmer so we haven’t experienced much mice activity yet, hoping it’s also because of this new repellent we have set up. I will update my review in the next few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Krizan

customer_reviews.title: Mice play around this device
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to rid my mountain house of mice. After a whole winter season we had multiple mice running next to this device with no effect. I tried all the settings as described in their manual but none had any effect. I can not recommend this product since it was totally ineffective in ridding my house of mice!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Ford

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I live in Queens NYC and we have bad reputation about rodent and rats in apartment . We always have been using master catcher glue board and other type of rodent repeller . Until we have use this and we have been amazed with the results . You need on for kitchen, one for living and one for bedroom . You would not see anymore of these creatures . I highly recommend to buy this again .
customer_reviews.author: duck lyn

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We have had this a couple months now. We bought it because we were hearing things crawling in the walls.... Loudly... Every night. Within 2 weeks there was no more noise. At this point we still have yet to hear anything in the walls or find any evidence of rodents, but we have multiple neighbors who have a really bad problem catching 2-3 mice a day while our place remains rodent free. Does exactly as advertised! I am tempted to buy more to just ensure there is no chance of our neighbors' problems coming over.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money..
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 units and put one downstairs and one upstairs. Downstairs, whenever we see ants and other small critters, roaches etc, we used to spray an expensive spray and they are all gone for another 6 months. After we installed these units, believe it or not, we haven't seen any of the above critters. Not even ants. We haven't sprayed anything for more than an year now. Sometimes I doubt myself asking - is this because of these units? Honestly I am not sure, but I don't see any other reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Vattamakal

product_meta.title: CLEANRTH CR008 Advanced Ultrasonic Rodent Repelling System | Superior Rodent Repeller
product_meta.description:
Looking for a simple, easy-to-use electronic rodent repeller that is unmatched for rodent control for your house or business?

 EASY TO USE The Cleanrth Advanced Rodent Repeller simply plugs into any 120v outlet and immediately begins electronic rodent repelling with its unmatched High Intensity Ultrasonic Generating Technology.

 DEEP PENETRATION The Digitally Processed electromagnetic waves generated by this device automatically go deep into the walls throughout your home or office. These electromagnetic waves cause slight vibrations that disturb the communication and living of pests, irritate their nervous system, and ultimately drive them away.

 UNMATCHED RODENT CONTROL Our Turbulent Storm Technique makes each speaker emit ultrasonic sounds at a different set frequency. This improved acoustic technique ensures that rodents cannot develop an immunity to the sounds. Rodent Targeting allows you to target specific hearing zones while Rodent Confusion hits the hearing zones of different rodents for unmatched electronic rodent control!

 CHEMICAL-FREE The Advanced Rodent Repeller is environmentally-friendly as it uses chemical-free ultrasonic sounds to electronically repel mice, rats and other rodents away from unwanted areas. The ultrasonic sounds fall outside the hearing ranges of humans, cats, dogs and birds, so you and your pets won't notice a thing.

 AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE We care about your repelling success, and we want to use our 25+ years experience in the Electronic Pest Repelling business to resolve your issue! When you buy from us, you are not only getting our guaranteed product, you are getting access to our support system of helpful staff that cares about your results. We promise to give you our help and know-how on how to proceed when a tougher-than-normal rodent control issue exists.
feature_bullets: Over Five New Dominating Rodent Repelling Features! - We've found that Change is Key when Rodent Repelling!
1) High Intensity Ultrasonic Rodent Repelling Technology 2) Digitally Processed Electromagnetic Inner Wall Rodent Repelling
3) Turbulent Storm Ultrasonic Rodent Repulsive Technique 4) Rodent Targeting Switch 5) Rodent Confusion Switch
Also has powerful 7,000 Square Feet of Open Area Coverage which all adds up to a very dominant Mice, Rat and Rodent Repeller
Includes a 1-Year Money Back Guarantee & 1 Year Warranty "We Care About Your Rodent Issue & We're Ready to Help"
